lead_paragraph: Playing on a Steinway piano rather than a harpsichord, Mr. Lifschitz gave compositions by Louis Couperin, Bach and others a homogeneous feel.

headline.main: Review: Konstantin Lifschitz Takes a Liberal Approach to ‘The Baroque Keyboard’

snippet: Playing on a Steinway piano rather than a harpsichord, Mr. Lifschitz gave compositions by Louis Couperin, Bach and others a homogeneous feel.

keywords.value: Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center
